newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: NBB to pay $26.5 mln dividend for 1996.
newsitem.headline: NBB to pay $26.5 mln dividend for 1996.

text.p: The National Bank of Bahrain (NBB) announced on Thursday it would pay a 10 million dinar ($26.5 million) dividend to shareholders for 1996, or 25 fils per share.
The bank, the biggest commercial bank in the island, paid a nine million dinar dividend to shareholders for 1995.
NBB announced on Wednesday it had made a 13.6 million dinar net profit in 1996, up 31 percent from the previous year's 10.4 million dinars. ($1=0.377 dinars)
